source.name: Short-Term Terminal Aerodrome Forecasts Data Access
source.description: The National Weather Service (NWS) Telecommunications Gateway provides current and recent Short-term Terminal Aerodrome Forecasts (12 hrs. or less) from around the world that are available from the NWS Internet Weather Source home page or via ftp://tgftp.nws.noaa.gov/data/forecasts/shorttaf.  Short-term TAFs are available as individual forecasts or in cycle files. The information available here is represented in a meteorological code .
